summary: When a scientists daughter is kidnapped, American Ninja (David Bradley), attempts to find her, but this time he teams up with a youngster he has trained in the ways of the ninja.
cast: David Bradley|Lee Reyes|Anne Dupont|Pat Morita|James Lew|Clement von Franckenstein|Marc Fiorini|Aharon Ipalé|Norman Burton|Tadashi Yamashita|Jose Guanchez|Vincente Perez|Jose Salvado|Carlos Ruiz|Tommy Arias|Rufino Perez|Vicente Vasquez|Fabrizio Mummolo|Tony Morey|Francisco Moreno|Julio Mujica|Freddy Alvarado|Alfredo Sandoval|Víctor Cárdenas
keywords: american ninja|fifth part|terrorist plot|murder of father|shirt ripped off
director: Director: Bob Bralver (as Bobby Gene Leonard)
title: El guerrero americano V
